stx.Dynamics

class
...

Static Methods

apply<A, B>(v : A, fn : A -> Void) : Void

Applies a function 'f' to a valuse of any Type.

into<A, B>(a : A, f : A -> B) : B

parameters
a Any value.
f Modifier function.
Applies Function1 f to value a and returns the result.

memoize<T>(t : Thunk<T>) : Thunk<T>

parameters
t The Thunk to call once
returns
A Thunk which will call the input Thunk once.
Returns a Thunk that applies a Thunk one time only and stores the result, after which each successive call returns the stored value.

toConstantFunction<S, T>(t : T) : Function1<S, T>

parameters
t Any value
returns
A function taking any value and returning the value of input parameter t.
Produces a Function1 that will return the input value t, regardless of the Function1's input.

toThunk<T>(t : T) : Thunk<T>

parameters
t Any value
returns
A function that will return the input value t.
Returns a Thunk that will always return the input value t.

withEffect<T>(t : T, f : Function1<T, Void>) : T

parameters
a Any value.
f Modifier function.
returns
a The input value after f(a).
Takes a value, applies a Function1 to the value and returns the original value.

withEffectP<A, B>(a : A, f : Function1<A, B>) : A

parameters
a Any value.
f Modifier function.
returns
a The input value after f(a).
Takes a value, applies a Function1 to the value and returns the original value.
